posts.message:
استفسار بسيط بخصوص AJAX و PHP
بستعمل Framework اسمه cjax وده لكتابة الاجاكس بال PHP بدون اي كتابة للجافا سكربت ولكن مشكلة هذا ال Framework ان اخر تحديث له كان في 2012 
هل في Framework بديل ليه ؟
انا عايز اكتب اجاكس من غير ما اتعرض للجافاسكربت
شكرا
posts.caption: phpajax.net
posts.description: Cjax is an MVC (Model-View-Controller) oriented, lightweight (>100kb) ajax framework aimed at PHP applications/sites. It allows you to literally execute JavaScript with PHP, sounds facinating - eh? Well it's true (You may test some demos).

posts.caption: polymer-project.org
posts.description: Web Components usher in a new era of web development based on encapsulated and interoperable custom elements that extend HTML itself. Built atop these new standards, Polymer makes it easier and faster to create anything from a button to a complete application across desktop, mobile, and beyond.

With BANQUE MISR Mobile, Get To Know More About:
- The Different Banking Accounts Such As Corporate Banking And Retail Banking and Islamic Banking.
- Information About Exchange Offices In The Different Countries
- Updates For Exchange Rates In 18 Different Countries (In Egyptian Pounds).
- Nearby ATMs And Also Navigate To Them.
- All BANQUE MISR Contact Information.
- Details About Available Credit Cards, Including Required Documents.
- Soon We Will Add Section For Loans That Will include the details and a how to calculate your loan if you decide to take one.
NOTE: This Application is NOT the official BANQUE MISR App, Your FeedBack Is Very Important As It's Still In Beta Version.

To Download This App from Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.restart.banquemisr

posts.message:
Dear Geeks,

I just need your opinion about something. Do you prefer to work with a project manager that has technical knowledge or one of those "business only" people who wouldn't know how to write a Hello World program and why?

I am asking this cause I have had good/bad experiences with both and wonder if it is just me or do other people have the same experiences as me?

What I mean is that how fast you learn is a lot more important than how much you know to begin with.  So in general I say that people emphasize too much how much they know and not how fast they're learning.

posts.message: What are the best options that provide for mobile backend as a service which support Android, iOS and Windows Phone?

Hello geeks :)
I want to make a mobile application using cordova(phonegap) which posts a link to social media accounts (google+ , facebook, twitter ,..) at the same time .
if there is a javascript way to post to many social media accounts at the same time !
Any help please ?!
Thanks in advance
